import './login.css' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import login from '../../images/login.jpg' import { useRef } from 'react' import { useContext } from 'react' import { Context } from '../../context/Context' import {LoginSuccess} from '../../context/Actions' export default function Login() { const userRef = useRef() const passwordRef = useRef() const {dispatch, isFetching} = useContext(Context) const handleSubmit = (e)=>{ e.preventDefault() dispatch(LoginSuccess(res.data)) } return (
